name: Laser Chess (itch)
description:
player has 3 types of units:

  • tank - can move in any direction at any distance and shoot orthogonally at any distance - 4 hp, 2 atk
  • jumpship - moves like a horse in chess, when it lands it attacks every adjacent unit - 2 hp, 2 atk
  • grunt - moves 1 tile orthogonally, shoots diagonally at any range - 2hp, 1atk

enemy also has 3 types of ships:

  • command unit - can't attack, only moves sideways.  if all command units are destroyed, the player wins - 5 hp
  • dreadnought - same as the jumpship but has 5 hp 
  • drone - only moves forward 1 tile, shoots diagonally at any range. if it reaches your starting row, the enemy wins - 2 hp, 1 atk

units block line of sight and only one unit can be on a tile

units only attack after moving (although player units can stand still and then attack)

there's ai vs ai and player vs ai, campaign is 5 levels after which maps are randomly generated, and you can also make your custom board
